name: Infernal Centaur
description: The Infernal Centaur is a strong creature, showcasing its imposing stature and a fierce demeanor. It is equipped with daggers for close combat, emphasizing its agility and combat capabilities.
memorable: This creature can exhale a devastating stream of fire, making it a significant threat in combat while also commanding respect from hell hounds.
goals: To assert dominance over fire-based creatures and lead hell hounds in combat.
relations: Hell hounds see it as a leader and will not attack it unless provoked.
environment: Typically found in fiery landscapes or regions associated with hell.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage provides resilience against fire-based attacks.
weaknesses: Moderate Dexterity may limit its mobility and initiative in combat.
attacks: Uses daggers both in melee and range, capable of dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Breath can engulf enemies in flames, dealing significant fire damage in a 15-foot cone.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 60 feet, aiding in navigation in low light.
skills: Proficient in intimidation and perception, allowing it to effectively coerce and notice details.
additional_information: Cruelty ability enables a second attack on a critical hit.
Hell Hound Affinity grants leadership over hell hounds.
Pack Tactics enhances combat effectiveness with allies nearby.
Good physical power and endurance reflected in high Strength and Constitution scores.
Average reasoning and social influence with Intelligence and Charisma scores.
